flamesdev.neon.physics

Class Hitbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • flamesdev.neon.physics.Hitbox

  • public class Hitbox
extends java.lang.Object
    A fundamental class used to simulate physics. Each game object which has collisions is encapsulated by this class.
